item.title: ‘I Know What You Did Last Summer’ Review: Freddie Prinze Jr. and Jennifer Love Hewitt Return for a Legacy Sequel Not Worth Screaming About
item.description: Madelyn Cline, Chase Sui Wonders, Jonah Hauer-King, Tyriq Withers and Sarah Pidgeon also star in Jennifer Kaytin Robinson’s film, set three decades after the 1997 original.

item.title: ‘I Know What You Did Last Summer’ Review: Freddie Prinze Jr. and Jennifer Love Hewitt Return for a Legacy Sequel Not Worth Screaming About
item.description: Madelyn Cline, Chase Sui Wonders, Jonah Hauer-King, Tyriq Withers and Sarah Pidgeon also star in Jennifer Kaytin Robinson’s film, set three decades after the 1997 original.

item.title: What Convinced Freddie Prinze Jr. to Return to ‘I Know What You Did Last Summer’
item.description: Prinze Jr. and Jennifer Love Hewitt are back, alongside a younger cast of Madelyn Cline, Chase Sui Wonders, Jonah Hauer-King, Tyriq Withers and Sarah Pidgeon.
